answers.answer: They let you refer to an entire collection, as well as the items in the collection, using a single name.
They let you iterate and facilitate the creation of terminating loops.
answers.feedback: Incorrect. Although loops are often used to iterate over sequences, not all loops use sequences.
Incorrect. Sequences can contain multiple integers, but they can be used for other objects also.

answers.answer: They make Python a Turing Complete language.
